section.heading: Maintenance of documents.
section.text: Copies of the specimen bonds and of the final Financing Documents and Closing Documents shall be filed in the Office of the Secretary of the District of Columbia.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 13 of Reunion Square Tax Increment Financing Emergency Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-250, Mar. 17, 2020, 67 DCR 3455).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 13 of Reunion Square Tax Increment Financing Second Emergency Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-370, Aug. 10, 2020, 67 DCR 9689).
For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 13 of Reunion Square Tax Increment Financing Temporary Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Law 23-146, Oct. 20, 2020, 67 DCR 9941).
